Description: The following statement contains a magic number: lock ( progressReportLock ) {                  Console.CursorLeft = 0;                  int maxProgress = Console.WindowWidth - 9;                  int progress = ( int )Math.Round( ( e.ProgressPercentage / 100f ) * ( maxProgress - 1 ) );                  Console.Write( "{0'3}% |"' e.ProgressPercentage );                  Console.Write( new String( '='' progress ) );                  Console.Write( '>' );                  Console.Write( new String( ' '' maxProgress - progress ) );                  Console.Write( '|' );              }
